Closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!

@JCBrouwer : Thanks for the update, hopefully that helps others. Note that the guide linked to isn't owned by TensorFlow team and in general for GPU support on macOS we rely on community support.

Closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!

@JCBrouwer : Thanks for the update, hopefully that helps others. Note that the guide linked to isn't owned by TensorFlow team and in general for GPU support on macOS we rely on community support.
